heroHook: Derek is a product manager at a fintech startup. Last Tuesday, she spent 45 minutes in a ChatGPT conversation building something important — sprint planning. By the next session, everything she'd established was gone — as if the conversation never happened. "ChatGPT losing context long conversation" isn't just a search query — it's the daily frustration of millions of AI power users who've hit the same wall.
